questions.question: When was this document last reviewed?
questions.description: Date of the most recent review for document maintenance

questions.question: When does this onboarding documentation become effective?
questions.description: The date when this onboarding process becomes active

questions.question: Who approved this onboarding documentation?
questions.description: Name or title of the person who approved this document

questions.question: Who is the document owner responsible for maintaining this onboarding documentation?
questions.description: Identifies the department or person responsible for this document

questions.question: What is your company name?
questions.description: Used throughout the document to personalize onboarding content

questions.question: What is the current version number of this document?
questions.description: Used for version control and tracking document updates

questions.question: What are the specific responsibilities of HR during onboarding?
questions.description: Detailed responsibilities for HR in the onboarding process
questions.placeholder: Managing onboarding documentation, completing employment paperwork, scheduling orientation sessions...

questions.question: What are the hiring manager's responsibilities during onboarding?
questions.description: Detailed responsibilities for the hiring manager
questions.placeholder: Setting expectations, introducing team members, assigning initial tasks...

questions.question: What are IT/Operations responsibilities during onboarding?
questions.placeholder: Setting up equipment, creating system accounts, security access...

questions.question: What are the new employee's responsibilities during onboarding?
questions.description: Detailed responsibilities for the new employee
questions.placeholder: Completing required training, asking questions, providing feedback...

questions.question: How often should this onboarding documentation be reviewed and updated?
questions.description: Establish the review cycle for maintaining current onboarding processes

questions.question: What are the key timeline milestones for your onboarding process?
questions.description: Define the timeline and focus areas for new employee integration

questions.question: What metrics will you use to measure onboarding success?
questions.description: Define how you will measure if the onboarding process is successful
questions.placeholder: Time to productivity, employee satisfaction scores, retention rates after 90 days...
